ygData.subject: Race war server.
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey gang, I just thought id let you know that when the new race war sever comes up myself and a very good friend are starting a guild. For those of you who
ygData.messageBody:
Hey gang,

I just thought id let you know that when the new race war sever comes up
myself and a very good friend are starting a guild. For those of you who
dont know the race war server is sort of like the PvP server Rallos Zek but
you cant just walk up and kill anyone. The Races are divided into teams and
only other teams can kill you. This is how the teams are made up so far:
Trolls, Ogres, Dark Elves (Probably Lizard Men too when they get added)
Barbarians, Humans, Erudites,
Wood Elves, High Elves, Half Elves.
Dwarves, Gnomes, Halflings.

Now this is going to be way better than Rallos zek cause you wont have some
person of your own race killing you. makes more sense this way.
The guild we are going to start is going to be called The Dark and is only
going to be made up of the team of Trolls, Ogres, and Dark Elves. This Guild
will attempt to bring misery and pain to those who follow the light. Both my
friend and i are roleplayers and enjoy the feeling of playing the bad guy.

So right now i am asking you if anyone wants to join us when the new server
comes out. We can always use Warriors, but we are also looking for other
classes too they are: Shamans, Rogues, Enchanters, Clerics In particular. I
am starting a Necro to be the Guild leader and My friend as Co leader will
be a wizard. We would like to get as many people as possible and if you want
to be a warrior thats fine! Heck thats GREAT! We just need people.

If you want more info on our guild or want to inquire about joining email me
at ZWANENJ@... during the week or zbitnew@... during the
weekend.

Thanks guys and i hope you all join me!

Lothaniel/Rayne T'kazz

> ----------
> From: Billy Barnett[SMTP:sigurd@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Wednesday, June 16, 1999 6:35 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] You want to know how weak warriors! Listen
> to t his!
>
> From: Billy Barnett <sigurd@...>
>
> In the experience with the Druid I wrote about earlier it didn't appear
> that
> group damage counted. I was a 12th warrior at the time with two rangers
> and a
> cleric if I remeber correctly and the three tanks coundn't outdamage that
> 13th
> druid. It wasn't until the cleric starting using expulse undead that we
> ever got
> experience. There may have been an undocumented fix in a patch since, but
> from
> that experience I believe that the experience went to the single PC that
> did the
> most damage not the group.
>
> Just my 2cp. Hope it helps,
>
> Surtur
>
> PS. I still haven't gotten a response on where to look for guild links for
> E'ci.
> Please email me with info if you have it please. Thanks all.
>
> "Mifsud, Michael" wrote:
>
> > From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
> >
> > I thought it WAS group damage vs. everyone else. i.e. allt he group
> damage
> > was added up together then compared to the steal killers total. Thats
> why,
> > really, only higher level wizards can steal kill. This is not the
> case??
>
>
